## Golden Helipad

### PM~2.5~

```{r pm25Data}
data<-readRDS("./preppedData/Golden Helipad.rds")

day <- data %>%
  dplyr::filter(PARAMETER == "PM25") %>%
  dplyr::select(date = DATE_PST,
                PM25 = ROUNDED_VALUE) %>%
  openair::timeAverage(.,
                       pollutant = "PM25",
                       avg.time = "day",
                       data.thresh = 75)

day %>%
  dplyr::filter(PM25>=25+0.5)
```
